tours.name: Snow White Spiti
tours.caption: Premium Spiti Snow Ride
tours.brief: Join us on a thrilling snow tour on a motorcycle from Chandigarh to Spiti Valley is an exhilarating adventure, blending the charm of the open road with the breathtaking landscapes of the Himalayas. The journey begins in Chandigarh, where riders set out on their powerful bikes, navigating through the bustling city before ascending into the snowcapped peaks. As riders traverse the winding roads, they witness a mesmerizing transformation in scenery, from the lush greenery of the lower Himalayas to the stark, snow-covered beauty of Spiti.

Destination focus on Spiti, Sangla, Tirthan valleys

tours.brief: Join us on an exhilarating motorcycle odyssey, traversing the rugged terrains of northern India from Chandigarh to Srinagar, Leh, Turtuk, Pangong Tso, and Manali, culminating in an unforgettable journey. Kick-start your adventure in Chandigarh, where modernity blends seamlessly with nature. Navigate through the enchanting landscapes as you ride towards Srinagar, immersing yourself in the picturesque beauty of Dal Lake and the vibrant markets.

tours.about: Continue the expedition to Leh, where the lofty mountains and ancient monasteries welcome you to a surreal realm. From Leh, venture off the beaten path to Turtuk, a hidden gem near the Pakistan border, offering a glimpse into a lesser-explored Ladakhi culture. Conquer the formidable roads leading to Pangong Tso, a mesmerizing high-altitude lake with everchanging hues. Ride through the magnetic landscapes before descending to Manali, where the lush valleys and towering peaks provide a dramatic contrast. As the journey comes full circle back to Chandigarh, you'll have etched indelible memories of conquering some of the world's highest motorable passes and witnessing the breathtaking beauty of the Himalayas.

tours.name: Snow White Spiti 4X4
tours.caption: Premium Spiti Snow Drive
tours.brief: Our new 4x4 Spiti snow adventure expeditions are designed for those who seek raw landscapes, remote trails, and the thrill of venturing where the road ends. From snowbound mountain passes to rugged desert tracks, every expedition is meticulously planned, safety-led, and driven by local insight. Blending proven expedition expertise with capable 4x4 machines, Beyond Tarmac adventures invites you to explore the wild with confidence, purpose, and a deep respect for terrain, culture, and the spirit of adventure.
highlights: The expedition begins in Chandigarh, transitioning from open plains into the foothills near Nalagarh. Focus on convoy discipline, vehicle checks, and radio coordination.
Climbing from Nalagarh into the apple-growing region of Thanedar, with cooler temperatures and winding mountain roads. Drivers adapt to elevation and tighter sections.
The route from Thanedar to Sangla enters deeper Himalayan valleys. Narrow roads, sharp drops, and changing weather increase driving intensity. A quick drive to Chitkul and back to Sangla.
The drive from Sangla to Tabo marks the first full entry into Spiti Valley. Visit Nako and Gue monastrey along the way. Terrain turns stark and barren with icy sections and winter conditions.
A high-altitude stretch connecting Tabo, Dhankar, and Kaza. Steep climbs, exposed ridgelines, and thin air test vehicles and drivers.
A remote village loop from Kaza to Ki, Kibber, and Chicham. Crossing the Chicham Bridge, one of the world’s highest, with deep valleys and snow walls.
Descending from Kaza to Kalpa, landscapes shift from Spiti’s cold desert to pine-covered slopes. Altitude drops and conditions soften.

The route from Kalpa to Shoja passes through forest roads and river valleys, smoother tarmac allows both crew and vehicles to recover. The infamous Jalori pass offers you one last bit of snow adventure.
The final drive from Shoja back to Chandigarh returns to the plains, closing a complete winter Spiti 4x4 expedition loop.
tours.about: Snow White Spiti is not designed for comfort—it is designed for commitment. This expedition explores Spiti Valley during the snow season, when access is limited, conditions are unpredictable, and the landscape is stripped down to its purest form. Guided by riders experienced in winter high-altitude travel, this journey prioritises acclimatisation, terrain awareness, and controlled riding over speed or distance. Each day unfolds slowly—through snow corridors, frozen valleys, and isolated Himalayan settlements that remain cut off for months. This is not a checklist ride. It is a deliberate, high-risk, high-reward winter expedition.

tours.name: Rajasthan
tours.caption: Riding the Royal Trails of Rajasthan
tours.brief: Embark on an extraordinary journey through Rajasthan, the land of kings and legends. Ride across the vibrant streets of Jaipur, past the artistic havelis of Mandawa, and through the rugged deserts of Bikaner and Osian. Marvel at the golden splendor of Jaisalmer, venture to the historic battlefields of Tanot and Longewala, and experience the magic of the Sam Sand Dunes under a starry sky. Traverse through Jodhpur's blue alleys, the regal charm of Udaipur, and the sacred ghats of Pushkar. This journey isn't just about the ride-it's about immersing yourself in the rich tapestry of Rajasthan's heritage, landscapes, and stories of valor.

Marvel at the grandeur of forts, palaces, and architectural wonders steeped in royal legacy.
Experience a fully supported tour with a dedicated and experienced team.
Enjoy comfortable accommodations, savor authentic local cuisine, and uncover the secrets of majestic forts and palaces.
Feel the thrill of dune bashing and witness unforgettable sunsets over the golden sands.
Travel with confidence, supported by comprehensive backup, mechanical expertise, and medical assistance led by a trained Wilderness First Responder (WFR).

tours.name: North Eastern Nirvana
tours.caption: Touch the Edge of India
tours.brief: Embark on an unforgettable journey to Bumla Pass, a high-altitude marvel nestled at over 15,000 feet above sea level, where India meets China. As you ride along the rugged, winding paths leading to this historic border, you'll traverse landscapes that shift dramatically from dense pine forests to barren, rocky terrains, each turn offering a breathtaking new vista. This route isn't just about the ride-it's about experiencing the echoes of history and valor.
highlights: Embark on a thrilling 10-night, 11-day motorcycle odyssey
Discover the spiritual heart of Arunachal Pradesh with a visit to Tawang Monastery, the largest monastery in India
Dive into the wild heart of Assam with an exhilarating safari in Kaziranga National Park, home to the iconic one-horned rhino
Uncover the charm of Shillong, the capital of Meghalaya, renowned for its rolling hills, vibrant culture, and cool, misty climate
Journey to the rain-drenched wonderland of Cherrapunji and trek through lush jungles to the iconic double-decker root bridge
Sail across the glass-like waters of Dawki, one of the world's clearest lakes, where the boat seems to float on air
Feel the mist of Meghalaya's spectacular waterfalls - NohKaLikai Falls, the tallest plunge waterfall in India, and Jung Falls, cascading through lush canyons
tours.about: Embark on an unforgettable journey to Bumla Pass, a high-altitude marvel nestled at over 15,000 feet above sea level, where India meets China. As you ride along the rugged, winding paths leading to this historic border, you'll traverse landscapes that shift dramatically from dense pine forests to barren, rocky terrains, each turn offering a breathtaking new vista. This route isn't just about the ride-it's about experiencing the echoes of history and valor.

tours.name: Southern Spice
tours.caption: Riding The South: Beaches - Twisties - Food
tours.brief: South India’s roads weave through forests, ancient temples, and timeless landscapes filled with rhythm and hidden magic. From winding mountain ghats to endless coastal highways, each ride offers adventure and breathtaking beauty. The varied terrain invites riders to explore lush plantations, vibrant villages, and serene backwaters, making every mile a unique experience. Riding here connects you deeply with the vibrant culture and natural wonders that make South India truly unforgettable
highlights: Ride through Wayanad's scenic ghats and misty hills, enjoying stays in relaxing resorts and exploring Edakkal Caves and tea estates.
Relax in Kumily's spice country with cozy nature resorts, spice plantations, and wildlife experiences in Periyar Sanctuary.
Explore heritage sites in Fort Kochi, staying in charming boutique hotels, visiting historic churches, and strolling through vibrant markets.
Cruise Kumarakom's famous backwaters, stay in traditional houseboats or riverside cottages, and take in sunset views on tranquil canals.
Unwind on Varkala's cliffside beaches, discover beach cafes, shop local markets, and visit the Janardanaswamy Temple.
Enjoy the peaceful atmosphere and mountain views in Kodaikanal, with waterfall visits and fresh air from cozy hillside resorts.
Experience Masinagudi's rich wildlife sanctuaries and serene forests, stay in cozy jungle lodges, and explore the rugged trails and scenic roads weaving through the Nilgiri Hills on your motorcycle.
Benefit from curated stays, group bonfires, and expert guides—making each day social, safe, and memorable.
tours.about: Feel the road beneath the wheels of your trusted steed as you journey through the mystical landscapes of South India. This option is perfect for riders who share a deep connection with their motorcycle and wish to create unforgettable memories.
